text:
I had a fantastic experience at the Starbucks outlet in 313@Somerset. The staff were friendly, efficient, and always greeted me with a smile. The coffee was brewed perfectly, and my favorite Caramel Macchiato was spot-on!

The seating area was cozy and clean, offering a nice place to relax or get some work done. Despite being in a busy mall, the ambiance was peaceful, and the Wi-Fi connection was reliable.

Definitely my go-to Starbucks in Singapore! Highly recommend for anyone in the area looking for great coffee and excellent!

Really hard to get seats on Sunday. Previously came was able to get any seats outdoor.
Thanks to the staff/manager guy in specs was patience to take orders despite busy crowd

Outstanding Service Experience
We had a wonderful experience last night around 8:30pm, thanks to the male staff on duty. He truly went above and beyond — incredibly patient, kind, and attentive. After I accidentally spilled my drink, he didn’t just help clean up the mess without hesitation, but even replaced it with a new one. His thoughtful gesture and warm attitude really made our evening.

I am a worlwide SB fan . This store is a disgrace . Look at the photo at the sugar station , a disgusting place to look at , let alone put your cup down to add sugar . Where have Starbucks standards descended to ??? Singapore is first world ???

by the far the best service received at Starbuckw.

the manager (in blonde) was cheerful and really efficiently coordinating operations, multitasking, and stepping in to assist wherever needed.

the barista making drinks remained calm, worked swiftly, and provided exceptionally polite service when handing out drinks as well. the 2 of them were patient, calm and wonderful!
